name: The Post-Standard (Syracuse)
title: Kate Spade Adds Its Unique Wordplay Mini Manhattan Tote To This Weeks Sale And You Wont Believe How Much It Costs.html
content: Best Gifts for Kids Gifts for Mom Gifts under $100 Best Stocking Stuffers Shopping **Kate Spade adds its unique Wordplay Mini Manhattan Tote to this week’s sale, and you won’t believe how much it costs** Updated:Jun. 11, 2025, 5:10 p.m. |Published:Jun. 11, 2025, 5:10 p.m. Yzzy Liwanag | YLiwanag@syracuse.com There’s nothing better than scoring a huge deal on an item you’ve been eyeing, and this week, we’ve been eyeing a ton ofKate Spade’sstunning purses. If Kate Spade’s constant bag deals aren’t enough for you, shoppers can score an extra 40% off with codeSALEONSALEuntil Sunday, July 6. One of Kate Spade’s most unique purses is up to 40% off. TheWordplay Mini Manhattan Totewas $328, but is on sale for $158. If you’re looking for a handbag that blends charm, practicality, and a touch of wit, the Wordplay Mini Manhattan Tote from Kate Spade is your perfect match. Inspired by leisurely mornings spent solving crosswords, this tote is a stylish nod to word lovers and city dwellers alike. **Why You’ll Love It:** Spacious Yet Compact: Despite its mini size, this tote is surprisingly roomy—big enough to fit even the largest iPhone, with space to spare. Eye-Catching Design: The “True White Multi” colorway adds a fresh, clean look with playful graphic elements that make it stand out. Premium Craftsmanship: As with all Kate Spade pieces, the quality is top-notch, ensuring durability and elegance in every stitch. Versatile Carry: Whether you’re heading to brunch, the bookstore, or a casual day out, this tote complements any outfit with ease. This tote isn’t just a bag—it’s a conversation starter. Whether you’re gifting it or treating yourself, the Wordplay Mini Manhattan Tote is a fashionable way to show off your love for words and style. Learn more about this producthere. **More Shopping and Deals** Disneyland celebrates Sleeping Beauty’s 70th anniversary with limited edition Aurora doll - Here’s where to get it DSW has a motherlode of Converse Chuck Taylors on sale this week up to 25% off Forget the Ninja SLUSHi, this ‘optimized’ slushie machine is on sale and it’s selling fast Kate Spade Outlet takes 77% off this summer-ready Kenzie Mini Crossbody Walmart is having a deal on the Keurig K-Iced Essentials for only $59, was $80 Generative AI was used to produce an initial draft for this story, based on data provided by Kate Spade. It was reviewed and edited by Syracuse.com.
